value.title: How to create a function app | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to create a function app using the Azure Portal. value.title: How to defend against denial of service attacks with Azure DDoS Protection | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Distributed denial of service (DDoS) attacks are rampant and it's not a question of if a business will be impacted but when. Anupam Vij shows Scott Hanselman how Azure DDoS Protection Standard can protect your applications against targeted DDoS attacks and why it is critical for every business running

value.title: How to quickly connect to a Linux VM with SSH | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to quickly connect to a Linux Virtual Machine (VM) with secure shell (SSH). If you have Linux VMs that are running inside of Microsoft Azure, you can easily establish an SSH connection.    For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips/

value.title: Improve security with Azure Sentinel, a cloud-native SIEM and SOAR solution | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Sarah Young joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure Sentinel, which is a scalable, cloud-native, security information event management (SIEM) and security orchestration automated response (SOAR) solution. Azure Sentinel delivers intelligent security analytics and threat intelligence across the enterprise,
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oiWInLYvnUk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Arturo Lucatero, a Senior Program Manager working on managed identities for Azure resources, explains what you can do with a managed identity. value.title: What is Azure Sentinel and why you should care | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn what Azure Sentinel is and how to use it. Azure Sentinel provides a threat detection and mitigation service that helps you to detect incident and threats when they happen and helps you to solve them as effectively as possible. topItems.excerpt: Explore non-relational data stores in Azure

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Introduction to blockchain on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to blockchain on Azure. See how blockchain allows business partners to trust each other's data without a central authority. You'll also learn a bit about how blockchain works. The goal is to help you decide if blockchain is a good choice for your scenario.

value.title: Azure Spring Cloud workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy Spring Boot microservices to Azure Spring Cloud (ASC).

value.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
value.excerpt: This module introduces Azure SQL. Learn about various deployment options and service tiers and what to use for your organization.

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service
value.excerpt: Image classification is a common workload in artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It harnesses the predictive power of machine learning to enable AI systems to identify real-world items based on images.

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage
value.excerpt: Find out to use Azure Queue storage to handle high demand and improve resilience in your distributed applications.

value.title: Contribute to an open-source project on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn how to

value.title: Build a .NET Core app for Azure Cosmos DB in Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a .NET Core application to store and query data in Azure Cosmos DB by using Visual Studio Code.

value.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Create a Content Delivery Network for your Website with Azure CDN and Blob Services
value.excerpt: This module looks at how to create and utilize a Content Delivery Network (CDN) within Azure to host commonly used assets, such as images in a website. The module covers Azure CDN rather than third-party integrations, and deals with using Blob Storage as an underlying storage model for stable or non-volatile data.

value.title: Create your first Azure IoT Central app
value.excerpt: This module builds an IoT Central app to monitor and command a refrigerated truck. The first unit creates the app, the second unit defines a device template for a refrigerated truck. Then, create a programming project, add code to simulate a truck, and communicate with your IoT Central app. The truck is monitored through a custom dashboard.

value.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure
value.excerpt: Azure provides a scalable, compliant, and enterprise-proven platform for a range of SAP workloads. In this module, you explore the platform compliance criteria that is stipulated by SAP before deploying SAP solutions in Azure, and look at the different options for deploying SAP in Azure.

value.title: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365

value.excerpt: Describe the identity protection and governance capabilities of Azure AD
